HeroHome.text1: Unlock Your Child's Abilities with H Platform
HeroHome.text2: In a rapidly changing world, learning alone is no longer enough ‚Äì your children must excel. H Platform is more than just an educational tool; it's the bridge connecting your children's dreams to their capabilities, empowering them to build their academic and professional future with confidence.

why.subtitle: We are redefining e-learning in an innovative and distinctive way
why.value1: Direct communication via WhatsApp with instructors for any inquiries or questions.
why.value2: Combining deep knowledge with an engaging and interactive teaching style to deliver information effectively.
why.value3: With an elite group of professional instructors who simplify complex concepts into enjoyable, easy-to-understand lessons for learners.

Courses.description: No matter your child's role or goal, H Platform is specifically designed to suit them and support their educational journey and future skill development.
Courses.title: Student or Teacher?
Courses.noCourses: No courses added currently, will be added soon

how-work.title: How Does H Platform Work?
how-work.content1: Browse upcoming or standard courses, and watch introductory videos to help you choose what suits you.
how-work.button1: Find the Right Course for You
how-work.content2: Easily register using Google or simple steps to create your account and profile on H Platform.
how-work.content3: Communicate directly with the administration to book your spot and join your chosen course.

Courses_card.comments_placeholder: Leave a comment to help others know your opinion...

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.content1: H Platform is a smart educational platform specially designed for children and young learners to develop their foundational skills, foster their creative abilities, and build a strong academic base through interactive content and tailored training sessions.
FAQ.questions2: Can I try H Platform for free?
FAQ.content2: Yes! You can try free lessons from any course before subscribing.
FAQ.questions3: How can I register for H Platform?
FAQ.content3: Simply! Visit our website, choose the right course for your child, and register your account in minutes. A free session awaits you as a start.
FAQ.questions4: Does the platform offer technical support or educational consultations?
FAQ.content4: Absolutely. Our support team is always available to assist you, and we offer educational consultations to help you choose the most suitable path for your children's development.
FAQ.questions5: How do I choose the right level for my child?
FAQ.content5: Contact us to provide you with a level assessment test for any course you need.

footer.name: H Platform
footer.slogan: Learn Smart and Start Your Journey Now

about-header.title1: With H Platform: Where Learning Begins and Never Stops.
about-header.title2: H Platform is a community that guides your children towards excellence, providing them with the tools and knowledge to advance confidently in a rapidly changing world. We create a comprehensive digital learning experience that elevates their ambitions from idea to academic and skill-based achievement.

offer-header.title2: Benefit from our carefully designed educational packages to help your children achieve their goals flexibly and at a lower price! Choose the offer that suits your child's interests and start learning today.

offer.title: Offers Available Now üéâ

offer.NoOffer: No offers available now, an offer will be added soon

about.description1: To provide direct learning that fits your schedule, engaging content that sparks your children's curiosity, and personalized learning paths designed specifically for them.
about.description2: At H Platform, we strive to make education a unique and impactful experience for your children by offering innovative, enjoyable, and accessible educational solutions for everyone ‚Äì regardless of age, background, or geographical location.
about.description3: We build a global community of young learners connected to knowledge and growth, where the latest technologies transform into life-changing educational experiences, opening doors to their future.

map.title1: Start Your Child's Educational Journey Today
map.title2: The future is in your children's hands; learn, grow, and achieve their dreams.

course-header.title1: Our Courses for Children and Young Learners
course-header.title2: H Platform is more than just an educational platform; it's a smart and inspiring experience combining advanced technology and the expertise of elite instructors to provide your children with real learning and development in their skills and abilities.

curricula-header.title1: Educational Curricula at H Platform for Children
curricula-header.title2: H Platform offers comprehensive educational curricula in core subjects like Arabic, English, Mathematics, and Mental Math, designed to suit all age and educational levels.

complaints.title2: We are always happy to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our courses, need quick technical support, or want to discuss partnership opportunities, our team is ready to assist you professionally and promptly.

term.title: Terms of Use
term.introduction: Welcome to our educational platform. These terms define the rules and conditions governing the use of the platform and its educational services. Please read these terms carefully before using the platform. By using it, you agree to be bound by these terms.
term.platform: Platform: Refers to the website that provides access to courses and educational content.
term.user: User: Any person who registers or uses the platform's services, whether a learner or an instructor.
term.services: Services: Includes all educational and interactive features provided by the platform.
term.content: Content: Includes all materials and information created, uploaded, or shared through the platform, whether by the user or the platform itself.
term.registration: Registration: The user must provide accurate and truthful information when creating their account.
term.responsibility: Responsibility: The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account data and not sharing it with others.
term.legal_use: Legal Use: It is prohibited to use the platform for any illegal or harmful activity.
term.ownership: Ownership: All rights related to the platform, its content, and services are owned by us or our licensors.
term.personal_use: Personal Use: The platform may only be used for personal educational purposes, and content may not be redistributed for commercial purposes.
term.disclaimer: Disclaimer: We are not responsible for any direct or indirect damage resulting from the use of the platform.
term.modifications: We reserve the right to amend these terms at any time. Amendments will be published here, and your continued use of the platform after amendments constitutes implied consent.
term.contact_us: For any inquiries or feedback regarding the terms of use, please contact us via

privacy.title: Introduction:
privacy.introduction: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and share information when you use our educational platform.
privacy.personal_information: Upon registration, we may ask you to provide personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and password.
privacy.usage_data: We collect information about how you use the platform, such as the courses you enrolled in and educational activities you engaged in.
privacy.service_provision: Service Provision: We use your data to create your account and provide technical support.
privacy.platform_improvement: Platform Improvement: We analyze usage data to enhance your experience and develop our services.
privacy.communication: Communication with You: We may contact you regarding platform updates or to respond to your inquiries.
privacy.service_providers: Service Providers: We may share your data with trusted providers who help us operate the platform, such as cloud hosting services.
privacy.data_security: We take appropriate measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or deletion.
privacy.title1: Request to view your personal data.
privacy.title2: Request correction of any inaccurate information.
privacy.title3: Request deletion of your data from our system.
privacy.title4: Object to any automated decisions made based on your data.
privacy.text1: We reserve the right to amend this policy from time to time. Any changes will be published on this page.
privacy.contact: If you have any inquiries about the privacy policy, you can contact us.

pages.Home_description: Unlock your children's potential with H Platform's smart learning. We offer engaging courses and interactive content to develop their fundamental skills and prepare them for a promising future and advanced academic stages.
pages.About_description: H Platform is a leading educational community guiding your children towards excellence. We create a comprehensive digital learning experience that empowers them with tools and knowledge to confidently progress from idea to academic and skill-based achievement.
pages.Courses_description: Explore a wide range of innovative training courses at H Platform, specially designed to foster children's and young learners' skills, and enhance their academic and creative abilities with expert instructors.
pages.Curriculum_description: H Platform provides comprehensive educational curricula for children and young learners in core subjects like Arabic, English, Mathematics, and Mental Math, tailored to suit all age and educational levels.
pages.offer_description: Benefit from H Platform's special educational packages, exclusively designed for your children. Get exclusive offers and discounts to help them achieve their educational goals and develop their skills flexibly and affordably.
